title: Short-Intensive Course for Integrating Aesthetic Sensibility and Mathematical Creativity in Vocational Education

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics knowledge and basic aesthetic literacy
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented education program integrating aesthetic sensibility into mathematical problem-solving processes in a mobile learning environment using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more computational models incorporating aesthetic elements by applying mathematical design principles.
Learners can explain a fusion process of aesthetic sense and mathematical reasoning in four or more stages according to the ADDIE model.
Learners can complete project deliverables reflecting aesthetic value by utilizing mobile devices and mathematical visualization tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
